column4: is there any major reason why you would customize ur kernel using apt-get / fakeroot  instead of just building from source package from kernel.org ?
is there any major reason why you would customize ur kernel using apt-get / fakeroot  instead of just building from source package from kernel.org ?
there's no difference, all fakeroot does is emulate a root enviroment so that root processe' dont mess with the root system itself.
